span.b: Continuous Learning Support Links and Information:

div.p: OPAA and USD 109 Food Service Employees will continue to work hard for your kids this week.
1. Please order from our website or this link: tiny.cc/mtk4lz and order FOR THE WHOLE WEEK.
2. PLEASE PICKUP THE MEALS YOU ORDER. This brings efficiency to a program that is a tremendous blessing during these times. PLEASE help with this!
4. This program requires that we "see" the children being served the meal you pick up. However, there will be a bit of leniency on this until the Governor lifts the Stay-At-Home order for our state.
5. Please take advantage of this program since many homes are going to be feeling the pinch financially from the complications due to Covid-19.

div.div: The Sophomore class visits Cloud County Community College.

Republic County gets 3rd place at State Wrestling.
Hunter Hartner gets 1st place at first annual high school sales competition at Kansas State University.
The 8th graders visiting the Eisenhower Museum in Abilene.
Kaleb Talkington- 3rd place, Jonathan Dyke- 4th, Quintin Beeson- 4th, Eyann Zimmerman- 2nd
